LanguageData.AS_WHE_BackstoryChild_a.title: Half Elf Child
LanguageData.AS_WHE_BackstoryChild_a.baseDescription: NAME spent his childhood as NAME in a small half-elf settlement as NAME.
LanguageData.AS_WHE_BackstoryChild_b.title: Half-elf child slave
LanguageData.AS_WHE_BackstoryChild_b.baseDescription: [CAPWN_nameDef] has a history of being captured and sold as [CAPWN_pronoun].
LanguageData.AS_WHE_BackstoryChild_c.title: Half-elf child trainer
LanguageData.AS_WHE_BackstoryChild_c.baseDescription: [CAPWN_nameDef] was raised as a child in a half-elf settlement. He often touches animals from an early age and has learned training techniques.
LanguageData.AS_WHE_BackstoryChild_d.title: Half-elf child farmer
LanguageData.AS_WHE_BackstoryChild_d.baseDescription: [CAPWN_nameDef] was raised as a child in a half-elf settlement. Since I was engaged in field work from an early age, I have acquired cultivation techniques.
LanguageData.AS_WHE_BackstoryChild_e.title: Half-elf child hunter
LanguageData.AS_WHE_BackstoryChild_e.baseDescription: [CAPWN_nameDef] was raised as a child in a half-elf settlement. Since I was engaged in hunting from an early age, I have acquired shooting skills.
LanguageData.AS_WHE_BackstoryChild_f.title: Half-elf child architect
LanguageData.AS_WHE_BackstoryChild_f.baseDescription: [CAPWN_nameDef] was raised as a child in a half-elf settlement. Since I was engaged in construction work since I was young, I have acquired construction technology.
LanguageData.AS_WHE_BackstoryChild_g.title: Half Elf Child Cook
LanguageData.AS_WHE_BackstoryChild_g.baseDescription: [CAPWN_nameDef] was raised as a child in a half-elf settlement. I have been cooking since I was a child, so I have a lot of cooking skills.
LanguageData.AS_WHE_BackstoryChild_h.title: Half-elf Child Apothecary
LanguageData.AS_WHE_BackstoryChild_h.baseDescription: [CAPWN_nameDef] was raised as a child in a half-elf settlement. Since he was engaged in the work of a pharmacist from an early age, he has acquired medical skills.
LanguageData.AS_WHE_BackstoryChild_i.title: Half-elf child warrior
LanguageData.AS_WHE_BackstoryChild_i.baseDescription: [CAPWN_nameDef] was raised as a child in a half-elf settlement. He has been training to protect the village since he was young, and has mastered combat techniques.
LanguageData.AS_WHE_BackstoryChild_j.title: Half-elf child blacksmith
LanguageData.AS_WHE_BackstoryChild_j.baseDescription: [CAPWN_nameDef] was raised as a child in a half-elf settlement. He has been involved in blacksmithing since he was a child, and has mastered blacksmithing techniques.
LanguageData.AS_WHE_BackstoryChild_k.title: Half-elf child blacksmith
LanguageData.AS_WHE_BackstoryChild_k.baseDescription: [CAPWN_nameDef] was raised as a child in a half-elf settlement. I have been involved in blacksmithing since I was young, and I have mastered blacksmithing techniques.
LanguageData.AS_WHE_BackstoryChild_l.title: Half-elf child prodigy
LanguageData.AS_WHE_BackstoryChild_l.baseDescription: [CAPWN_nameDef] was raised as a child in a half-elf settlement. From an early age, he was clever and the center of attention for children.
LanguageData.AS_WHE_BackstoryChild_m.title: Silent half-elf child
LanguageData.AS_WHE_BackstoryChild_m.baseDescription: [CAPWN_nameDef] was raised as a child in a half-elf settlement. Ever since I was little, I have been reluctant to communicate.
LanguageData.AS_WHE_BackstoryChild_n.title: Half Elf Child
LanguageData.AS_WHE_BackstoryChild_n.baseDescription: [CAPWN_nameDef] was raised as a child in a half-elf settlement.
LanguageData.AS_WHE_BackstoryChild_o.title: Half Elf Child
LanguageData.AS_WHE_BackstoryChild_o.baseDescription: [CAPWN_nameDef] was raised as a child in a half-elf settlement.
LanguageData.AS_WHE_BackstoryChild_p.title: Half Elf Child
LanguageData.AS_WHE_BackstoryChild_p.baseDescription: [CAPWN_nameDef] was raised as a child in a half-elf settlement.
LanguageData.AS_WHE_BackstoryChild_q.title: Half Elf Child
LanguageData.AS_WHE_BackstoryChild_q.baseDescription: [CAPWN_nameDef] was raised as a child in a half-elf settlement.
LanguageData.AS_WHE_BackstoryChild_r.title: Half Elf Child
LanguageData.AS_WHE_BackstoryChild_r.baseDescription: [CAPWN_nameDef] was raised as a child in a half-elf settlement.
LanguageData.AS_WHE_BackstoryChild_s.title: Half Elf Child
LanguageData.AS_WHE_BackstoryChild_s.baseDescription: [CAPWN_nameDef] was raised as a child in a half-elf settlement.
LanguageData.AS_WHE_BackstoryChild_t.title: Half Elf Child
LanguageData.AS_WHE_BackstoryChild_t.baseDescription: [CAPWN_nameDef] was raised as a child in a half-elf settlement.
